<template>
  <v-card style="width=1200px"> </v-card>
</template>
<script setup>
import { useRoute } from "vue-router";
import { ref, computed, onMounted } from "vue";
import { useStore } from "vuex";
const store = useStore();
const route = useRoute();
const job_id = ref(route.params.job_id);
const task = computed(() => {
  return store.state.contractor.taksByJobId;
});
const path = "../../../backend/public";
onMounted(async () => {
  await store.dispatch("triggerSetTask", { job_id: job_id.value });
  console.log(store.state.contractor.taksByJobId);
});
</script>
<style scoped></style>
